pages.text:
Special Events
Events
Slide
Let us host your next event!
At Island Way Grill we strive to make your special event one to remember. We offer both private and semi-private spaces at our restaurant and also have the availability to cater to any venue of your choice. Every element, from food to d√©cor, will be carefully crafted with attention to every detail.
Our passion is to offer exceptional service and truly genuine hospitality to each and every guest. Vip treatment is standard as we create a memorable experience. Our event planners, Sheri Aquilar and Amber Pearce, will work with you to create a spectacular menu for you and your guests. We look forward to seeing you soon.
We know event planning can be stressful, but we can help make your event worry free, leaving you more time to celebrate.
Event Menus
Request a Quote
Catering Information
Slide
Let us host your next event!
At Island Way Grill we strive to make your special event one to remember. Our event planners, Sheri Aquilar and Amber Pearce, will work with you to create a spectacular menu for you and your guests. We look forward to seeing you soon.
We know event planning can be stressful, but we can help make your event worry free, leaving you more time to celebrate.
Event Menus
Catering Info
Request a Quote
Slide
Our Event Coordinators
Amber Pearce
Born and raised in Florida, Amber has worked for BayStar Restaurant Group at Island Way Grill since 2006. Amber has been a huge part of the success not only at Island Way Grill, but also BayStar Catering. She has assisted in events such as the Clearwater Jazz Holiday, Clearwater Super Boat Race and also the Sugar Sand Festival. Amber shows an extreme amount of passion for her job and it shows in the success of all types of events. Whether she is planning a birthday celebration, baby shower, wedding anniversary, corporate event, Holiday party or your full wedding ceremony and reception, she will assure that every detail is complete. BayStar has received numerous compliments regarding Amber‚Äôs attention to detail, calm demeanor, and ability to communicate with not only customers but also her staff. Along with taking on your every need Amber is also an avid Runner, biker and swimmer. She has participated in numerous ¬Ω marathons, full marathons, and also triathlons.
Sheri Aquilar
Born and raised in Wisconsin, Sheri moved and found her new home in Florida. She has lived in and around Clearwater since 1984. Marrying  Jason in 2001 and has twin boys Daniel and Jonathan. Being in the hospitality business for over 30 years, Sheri has learned every aspect of the business. Her favorite area being event planning and catering. She has coordinated events for the VIP area of the Clearwater Jazz Holiday for three years, Hospitality coordinator for the Clearwater Super Boat Race from its beginning in 2008, and coordinator for the VIP/Dining experience for the Sugar Sand Festival. Planning numerous events and weddings both at Island Way Grill and also local venues in and around Clearwater. Sheri is currently the catering Manager for BayStar Catering and also BayStar Restaurant Group.
Slide
What our guests are saying...
Good morning Amber,
As I sit back today and think about Megan and Joshes wedding celebration, I cannot thank you enough for the remarkable job you did. I hope I was not too crazy a bride mom but there was not 1 complaint about a thing. Your staff was spectacular, the food, drinks and decor set up was 1000% perfect.
If you would like me to put a review anywhere please let me know. Personally I think anyone NOT using your venue for a wedding our size is crazy!!
Many many thanks
Kathy and Brian Schauer
Hi Amber,
My name is Gloria. On Saturday February 8, we celebrated my mother Debi‚Äôs birthday at Island Way Grill. When I arrived an hour before the event to decorate, I was pleasantly surprised by the amazing staff.
Right away, they began working diligently to find the perfect color scheme that would complement the cake and decor I had brought. Two staff members, Britt and Tony, went above and beyond to make the event truly special. They meticulously arranged the cake table and all the guest tables with the appropriate linens and runners, creating a visually appealing and coordinated look. It was evident that their exceptional customer service made a significant difference in the overall success of the event.
I will definitely be a repeat customer for our next celebration. I hope you can express my sincere appreciation to your staff for their outstanding efforts.
Best wishes,
Gloria

Who We Are
About Us
Our Team
Giving Back
Direct Seafoods
Artwork
Affiliated Restaurants
Slide
At the Island Way Grill, we're all about fresh fish
Our boats make daily trips to the gulf where we retrieve fresh grouper, mahi, snapper and other local varieties. No long-line fish here-just hook, rod, and reel. If it's any fresher, it is still in the gulf.
Slide
Many of our dishes revolve around our oak and citrus open firepit
which sears at an extremely high temperature and adds a delicious smokiness to everything grilled. You'll find an abundance of fresh herbs and only the best quality seasonings. Fresh vegetables are used throughout our menu, and all soups and sauces are hand-prepared daily.
Slide
WE PROVIDE AN EXCELLENT SELECTION OF THE WORLD‚ÄôS FINEST OYSTERS
flown in fresh for your enjoyment. We also have an extensive sushi menu, made from the freshest fish available. In addition to our menu, our chefs prepare an assortment of daily specials that always add an element of interest.
Slide
JOIN US FOR A MEMORABLE
WATERFRONT MEAL
island way grill is situated on the clearwater inter-coastal waterfront and is adjacent to clearwater marine aquarium, making it the perfect end to an exciting family day, or an ideal spot for a romantic evening out. there are boat slips adjacent to the restaurant, making it easy to visit by boat, especially during our popular sunday brunch!
Slide

Slide
Giving Back
It is the love, support, and healthy appetite of the people in our community that make Island Way Grill & Baystar restaurant group successful! We believe that success doesn‚Äôt result from what you get, but from what you give. Baystar Restaurant Group proudly supports many local charities such as:
Chi Chi Rodriguez Academy
Clearwater for Youth
Clearwater Community Sailing Center
Clearwater Marine Aquarium
Pinellas Education Foundation
and More!
Slide
Direct Seafoods
When you visit Island Way Grill or any Baystar Restaurant you know you will be getting the freshest seafood available. Baystar Restaurant Group, works with local fishermen via Direct Seafood to provide fresh-off-the-boat gag grouper, black grouper, red snapper, lane snapper, amberjack, yellowtail, and more!
Our fishermen dock at Salt Rock Grill, at our own processing facility, and filet and ship 100s of pounds of fresh fish daily to all Baystar restaurants.
Learn more at
direct-seafoods.com
.
Slide
Artwork
When visiting Island Way Grill you may notice a variety of local artwork throughout the restaurant. Interested in learning more about the artists or even owning one of the pieces?
All artwork is available for purchase through the artist websites below.
Glass Vases:
Duncan McClellan :  www.dmglass.com
Metal Pictures:
Clayton Swartz:  wwwclaytonswartz.com
Slide
Baystar Restaurant Group is the parent company of 10 restaurants in the Tampa Bay Area including Island Way Grill. Led by Frank Chivas, Baystar aims to provide both a delicious experience and an excellent value. Baystar restaurants have a warm tropical feel, and feature menus dominated by fresh seafood, much of which is provided by Chivas‚Äô own fleet of dayboats. This source of fresh local seafood combined with creative chefs has established a strong reputation for Baystar‚Äôs restaurants as excellent dining destinations within the Tampa Bay area.

User Reviews
7/30/2025
Was in family vacation to Clearwater, found this restaurant on way to Publix. You can dine in or along waterfront. Food and service was excellent, definitely going back on our next trip here!

7/24/2025
Manoli took care of us on 25th anniversary and he is a 5 star server! Curtious, attentive and knowledgeable! Fantastic food and great setting too.

6/11/2025
We ate here once for dinner and 2 times for an early dinner. I got 3 different meals and they were all delicious! The servers were amazing. I highly recommend this for dinner or early dinner.
read more
read less
5/10/2025
5 stars as always! Island way is the sexiest restaurant in Clearwater.  We had fantastic service from the valets to the hostess and to the server and service team.  The Caribbean snapper was special, I highly recommend it. Surf and turf was spot on as well. The kids popcorn chicken was well received from an exceptionally picky 7 year old. Always a fantastic dinner whenever we are in town, see you next time, Island Way!

3/09/2025
Christine was fantastic! So helpful and so accommodating, she really helped us from start to finish. The buffet was delicious and she recommended the avocado toast and the eggs Benedict. 10/10 recommend.  Thank you Christine! Will definitely be returning.

3/09/2025
The restaurant checks all the boxes. Service is top notch, facilities are clean and modern, food was fresh and delicious. Menu provided options for every pallet. Our server(Justin) was helpful and very professional. The place was crowded, so I reservations are a good idea (open table).   I highly recommend this establishment and I look forward to returning.
read more
read less
3/06/2025
Popped in without a reservation tonight for dinner, so our only choice open was at the Sushi Bar.  That didn‚Äôt matter though, because we were instantly greeted by Maddie, our server and she provided excellent service through the evening.  The food was absolutely amazing and so was the service!  We are going back on Saturday to celebrate our Birthdays and have asked to be seated in Maddie‚Äôs section.  She‚Äôs a gem! Oh, also, best Key Lime Pie I‚Äôve ever eaten!
read more

2/19/2025
this fine establishment offers multiple dinner meals for $22 per person which includes a Caesar salad and a small dessert - $5 tasty house house if ordered before 5:30 PM every day,  my wife and I have tried the filet mignon last week  and tonight we tried the volcano meatloaf - both five star excellent - our server Russ far surpassed our expectations. Also, I should add , that if it rains the outside area at this place and others do not operate - therefore it was packed. Suggest a reservation if a rainy day. Cheers.

Baystar Restaurant Group is the parent company of 10 restaurants in the Tampa Bay Area including Island Way Grill. Led by Frank Chivas, Baystar aims to provide both a delicious experience and an excellent value. Baystar restaurants have a warm tropical feel, and feature menus dominated by fresh seafood, much of which is provided by Chivas‚Äô own fleet of dayboats. This source of fresh local seafood combined with creative chefs has established a strong reputation for Baystar‚Äôs restaurants as excellent dining destinations within the Tampa Bay area.
